sample

Class StaticModeLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.DataLoader
      • sample.StaticModeLoader

  • public class StaticModeLoader
extends DataLoader
    Class that is responsible for loading the data in static mode. In addition to loading the basic data from the DataLoader class it validates and processes the arguments the user has given the program when starting it in the console. Depending on which parameters were passed it will either give the user an error message if the input was invalid run the program in Test-mode or display the data filtered according to his inputs. This class does its job but can be improved to increase code readability.
